about.about__text: Systems engineer / Junior freelance developer of web sites and applications according to customer needs using the SCRUM methodology. I have 2 years of experience in the educational sector with degrees of basic and medium technical work in basic programming. I have teaching and teamwork skills.

stack.stack__subtitle: I design and code beautiful and simple things. I love learning and what I do.
